alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Jackson; Trempealeau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 12 at 2:57PM CDT until April 12 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Winona County in southeastern Minnesota... Southeastern Buffalo County in west central Wisconsin... Southwestern Jackson County in west central Wisconsin... Trempealeau County in west central Wisconsin... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 257 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Goodview, or near Winona, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Public reported 1 inch hail at 245 pm. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Winona and Fountain City around 300 PM CDT. Arcadia around 315 PM CDT. Blair around 330 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Franklin, Czechville, Merrick State Park, Lock And Dam 5 A, Camp Decorah, Dodge and Beach Corners. This includes Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 246 and 256. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
